title: chat service down again?
body: why is the chat service always breaking?

replies.body: As an update, it looks like some players on EUW are having this [issue connecting to chat](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw).  We're working on this now to get it fixed up.  Thanks for the report!

In case it helps, the service is only down in lobby, champion select and in the post-game screen. It works fine during the matches themselves.
I'm one of the EUW players whos having issues, so let me know if I can supply you with logs or specs to help.

Are you still experience an issue?  I wasn't able to locate any issues with chat on EUW or via the[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Your network could be having an issue connecting to the chat server, and to help rule out possibilities I would suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  Hopefully this helps out, but let me know if you have issues afterwards!

Update:  Some players are having an issue connecting to chat on EUW.  We're working on a fix and will be providing updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.
Still got the issue. My internet is definitely not the problem here. It's not client-side, it is server-side.
